articles.author: Jack Guy
articles.title: T. rex ancestors crossed from Asia to North America via land bridge 70 million years ago, study finds - CNN
articles.description: A new study based on mathematical modeling weighs in on the fierce debate among paleontologists over the origins of the king of the dinosaurs, Tyrannosaurus rex.
